Large factor analysis residuals

large.residuals.Rd

Identifying large residuals in a matrix of factor analysis residuals

Usage

large.residuals(x, upper = 0.08, lower = -0.08)

Arguments

x

A square matrix of residuals of a factor analysis

upper

Upper limit for acceptable residuals (defaults to 0.08)

lower

Lower limit for acceptable residuals (defaults to -0.)

Value

Statistics relating to the residuals

Examples

library(psychTools)
data(bfi)
myresiduals <- psych::fa(bfi[1:10], nfactors = 2)$resid
myoutput <- large.residuals(x = myresiduals)
#>
